# eui-item-counter



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                                                            | Type                             | Default   |
| ------------ | ------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- | --------- |
| `activeItem` | `active-item` | Number of active items                                                                 | `number`                         | `1`       |
| `allItem`    | `all-item`    | Number of all item                                                                     | `number`                         | `1`       |
| `size`       | `size`        | sets the size of the component can be 'small', 'medium' or 'large' defaults to 'small' | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small"` | `'small'` |
